content.webTitle: Sony prepares PSX to compete with Xbox

fields.headline: Sony prepares PSX to compete with Xbox
fields.bodyText: Sony has revealed details of the PSX "entertainment device". It seems to be a PS2 that follows the Microsoft Xbox in including a hard drive and broadband, then throws in a few extras, such as a TV tuner. The PS2's original i.Link (Firewire) port seems to have given way to a USB 2.0 port. Exteme Tech has details and photos. Sorry, no prices. Note: this is not the PlayStation 3.
